attributes.action: Stop plans to give military plane £900,000 makeover during COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Given people have lost jobs, family members and cannot afford to eat this is a massively insensitive way to use taxpayers money. This will not further the UKs image to the world, it merely demonstrates how out of touch they are with current issues within the county and globally.
attributes.background: The government must stop insensitive plans to paint Union Jack on a military plane under the proviso it is ‘good for the UK’. This plan must be scrapped! There are other more beneficial uses of taxpayers money during a global pandemic.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

We understand that you're also concerned about job losses and public services. You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318316
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
